text: Anata ga nanigoto ni jūji shite ite mo, mata kuruān no dono bubun o dokuju shite ite mo, mata anata gataga don'na okonai o shite iyoutomo, anata gataga sore ni uchi konde iru kagiri, ware wa kanarazu anata gata no tame no risshō-shadearu. Tenchi no mijin no omo-sa mo, anata no nushi kara manukare rarenai. Mata sore yori mo chīsai monode mo, ōkī monode mo (subete) hakkiri to shomotsu no naka ni (shirusa rete) nai mono wa nai nodearu
